revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Sprint |model=Overdrive |revision=Pro 3G/4G Mobile Hotspot |fcc_date=02/01/2011 |manuf_country=China |os_manuf=No |manuf=Sierra Wireless |manuf_model=AirCard W802S |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=mobile hotspot, 3G mobile router, WiMAX modem, |fcc_id=N7N-MHS802 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88AP300 |cpu1_cspeed=624 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29C2G24MAAAAHAML-5 IT |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT29C2G24MAAAAHAML-5 IT |expansion_if_types= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8786 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi2_module=Sierra Wireless AirPrime MC5728V |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (USB) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=MDM6085 |wi2_chip2_brand=Beceem |wi2_chip2_model=BCSM350 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=CDMA/WiMAX |wi2_ant_conn= |eth_none=true |addl_chips= |flags=4G (WiMAX), 3G (CMDA), MicroSD Card slot, battery, screen, |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=OverdriveProXXX |default_ssid_regex=^OverdrivePro[A-F0-9]{3}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass=password |oui=84:DB:2F }} :[http://support.sprint.com/global/pdf/user_guides/sierra_wireless/overdrive_pro/overdrive_pro_by_sierra_wireless_ug.pdf User Guide]
"SIERRA WIRELESS", "1400493. REV B", and "MADE IN TAIWAN" :is on the board in the FCC photos.
The FCC internal photos show the device with the following... *[[Marvell]] 88AP300-BGK2 SoC @624MHz [http://www.marvell.com/guide/assets/data/marvell_psg.pdf DS] [http://avnetexpress.avnet.com/store/em/EMController?term=88AP300&x=15&y=11&action=products&langId=-1&storeId=500201&catalogId=500201&hbxSType=&N=0&filterButton=true BD] *[[Marvell]] 88W8786-NAP2 - 802.11b/g Chip *[[Qualcomm]] MDM6085 - CDMA 3G Radio *[[Beceem]] BCSM350 - WiMAX (4G) Chip *''Micron'' MT29C2G24M - LPDRAM/Flash (NAND) 128/256MB [http://www.digchip.com/datasheets/parts/datasheet/301/MT29C2G24MAAAAHAML-5_IT.php DS] *[[Samsung]] K521H57ACM-A060
Units contributing to this entry are below... :WiFi OUI: 84:DB:2F, WiMAX OUI: 00:A0:D5
The default SSID pattern for these devices appears to be :'''OverdriveProXXX''' (where '''XXX''' is the last three :hex digits [upper case letters] of the AP's BSSID)
===Reviews=== *[http://www.pcmag.com/article2/0,2817,2385937,00.asp Review on '''PCmag'''] :''[[Virgin Mobile]]'' also provides this device :(with their branding) for their service.
